group_1.textRight: I didn’t even think you’d be showing up too.

group_1.textCenter: The Pleiades Saints are back in business,@of course I had to come check that out!

group_1.narration: A dependent Incubator, going by Juubey.
He goes against Kyuubey’s innocent malice,
as well as the ruthlessness of the Magical Girl system.
He’s a substitute to the Incubators,@born out of our combined magic…
And also, an ally of the Pleiades Saints…@That’s who Juubey was.
It all began at the depths of despair…@inside a Witch’s Labyrinth.
Before we became Magical Girls…@when me and Kaoru had our dreams shattered,@we were in total misery.
Nico, Saki… Satomi and Mirai, as well…@We were all hurting deeply,@and had fallen into despair.
We fell to a Witch’s spell, and were about to take our@own lives, when our savior appeared before us…
And that was Michiru Kazusa.
“There is still hope to be had!”
Michiru saved our lives,@and with her strawberry risotto,@showed us how much we still wanted to live.
And the once-suicidal six of us@all became Magical Girls.
The septet formed a team, which Michiru made@in the image of the Seven Sisters.
“We’re the Pleiades Saints,@the team I’ve always wanted~!”
Our days with Michiru were filled with joy.
We kept people safe as Magical Girls, and prided@ourselves in our fight against Witches.
We were so happy to not be alone, to have the@bonds we had with our friends.
We laughed together at things as simple as being@hungry. Every single thing sparkled with light.
However…the end came without a warning.
Michiru turned into a Witch, and we learned@the truth of Magical Girls…
An even deeper despair…that was where@our “mistake” began.
The remaining Pleiades Saints would resume@operations with two objectives in mind.
The first…the rejection of the wholly inconsistent@Magical Girl system.
“The Freezer,” where Magical Girls on the verge of@turning into Witches were preserved…
Juubey, who made it possible to purify our Gems@in the shortage of Grief Seeds…
The magic cast over all of Asunaro City that made@the Incubator virtually invisible...
...to the point where he was even@written out of our memories.@In other words, “killing” Kyubey…
All of it was in opposition to the Magical Girl system,@our “resistance.”
And, the other objective the Pleiades Saints@would work towards realizing…
…was to resurrect Michiru.
